CatDescriptText: Madison McDaniel was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Out column published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 4, 1975, pg. 4. "...This week Pittsburghers Speak asked football enthusiasts what they thought of the "74" Steelers and their quest for the "big bowl." Answer reads: "I think that we have a very good chance to make it to the Super Bowl and win if the defensive linemen holds up and exerts pressure on the opposing quarterbacks, but first we must get past the Raiders.  I particularly like the defensive squad and the way the offense has been controlling the football."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Madison McDaniel wearing overcoat, hat, and eyeglasses standing on sidewalk in front of house
